name: Perch Home & Company
description: Complete renovation of a retail space in downtown Maplewood. This project transformed an outdated storefront into a modern, inviting home goods boutique.
services: Custom checkout counter and service area
outcome: Working closely with the owners, we designed and implemented a layout that maximizes both product display space and customer flow. The project was completed on schedule and within budget, allowing the business to open on their target date.
